name: Rocamadour Plage
description:
Directional arrows or Joystick (no other button needed).

Made for the One Minute Game jam #7 (Theme: Under_Water)... I didn't have time to add some fish :'.

Source on GitHub (soon), License GPLv3

Music and other assets, License CC0 or similar

First attempt with Godot after losing too much time trying to make games in C, SDL and WebAssembly. It was very interesting to see how the engine developers thought game development.
